Merge pull request #36 from dylanfw/ISSUE-35

Split from the right when extracting credentials

commit.message:
Split from the right when extracting credentials

It's important to split on the first '@' character from the right to
ensure that special characters in the password aren't interpretted as
part of the hostname.

commit.message: Remove downloads badge from README
Stop testing against Python 2.6 on Travis
Bump version to 1.4
Bump dev requirements to latest versions
Cleanup README

Convert doctests to Python 3

Basically remove all the "u'" strings.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/codeinthehole/purl
Bump version to v1.3.1

Ensure paths start with slash from constructor

Prior to this change, paths passed without a leading slash would lead to
invalid URLs.
Update README

commit.message: Switched broken pypip.in badges to shields.io

Allow to remove username and password from URL

For now, it is impossible to strip username or password from URL by calling `.username("")` or `.password("")`. This small change fixes the problem.

verification.payload:

Allow to remove username and password from URL

For now, it is impossible to strip username or password from URL by calling `.username("")` or `.password("")`. This small change fixes the problem.
